programme.title: My Dream Quinceañera: Dani Part 1
programme.desc: Dani and her family finally see her final invitations and the seating arrangements. Dani skateboards, models and has big dreams to become a fashion designer, but will this be her dream Quinceañera?

programme.title: My Dream Quinceañera: Dani Part 2
programme.desc: It's the morning of Dani's quince and the calm before the storm. She gets some great advice from her mom as they talk about what her quince was like back in Mexico. She's about to finish getting ready when she realizes Gustavo is late once again!

programme.title: Life After Quince
programme.desc: The girls are back and feeling a bit daring! Shany and Alyssa meet up at a skatepark to hatch out some low-key beef. Meanwhile, Airam addresses Xavier about his surprise guest at the Before I Fall premiere.

programme.title: Life After Quince
programme.desc: The girls are back, and ready to shake things up! Shany sets up a fashion collab with Eileen to give Airam a new saucy Selena look. Later, the girls meet up at Shany's place for John's graduation party.
programme.sub-title: Life After Quince Sharing Our Future
